resources.string: For more info or to donate toward the cause, please visit www.ForTheGamer.com

New in this version:
- Fix for HTC Incredible when viewing News Features
- Fix for About button disappearing when highlighted

 Please send comments, questions, bug reports to info@forthegamer.com
Game and News data is provided by www.GamesRadar.com. However, this application is not affiliated with the site in any way.
